about-para: Our dedicated people bring over 400 years of IT knowledge and experience to your business. Based in the Greater Manchester area, we support small medium and big business. IT Compliance. VOIP. No-Obligation Quote. Full Support Team On Hand. Cloud Services. IT Security. Disaster Recovery. Server Support. Monitored By Experts. Backup. Services: IT Support, Telecoms Support.
about-para2: Infinity Group are one of the leading IT Support Companies in the UK. Award Winning IT Support Company in the UK. Call us for a Quote. London IT Support. Microsoft Gold Partners. UK Based Helpdesk. Cost Effective Solutions. Engineer Support in 1 Min. IT Consultancy.
about-para3: Our best-of-breed IT solutions will drive efficiency and change. We specialise in advice, implementation and support for Office 365. Take advantage of the Cloud with solutions designed for you. Protect your business with our leading business continuity solutions. Get ultra-fast business-class connectivity and internet solutions.
